name: GNBCUCPFunction
description: NR gNB Central Unit (CU) Control Plane (CP) resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: peeParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter list for the control and monitoring of power, energy and environment

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: gnbId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identifies a gNB within a PLMN (3GPP 38.300)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: gnbCuName
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identifies the Central Entity of an NR node (3GPP 38.473)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: pLMNIdList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of PLMN-Id: Mobile Country Codes (MCC) or Mobile Network Codes(MNC) (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: NRCellCU
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Information required by CU responsible for management of inter-cell mobility and neighbour relations via ANR

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: EP_F1C
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of control plane interface (F1-C) between DU and CU or CU-UP.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: EP_E1
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of E1 interface between gNB-CU-CP and gNB-CU-UP

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: EP_XnC
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of Xn Application protocols to a neighbour gNB node

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: EP_X2C
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of X2-C application protocols to a neighbour eNB or en-gNB node

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: EP_NgC
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of control plane interface (NG-C) between gNB and NG-Core entity
